description.narrative: The objective of the project is to reduce transport costs thereby enhancing the social and economic integration of the south western part of Botswana. In addition, the project will facilitate the economic cooperation between Botswana and Namibia.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Transport - policy, planning and administration
